rows.label: qst700807_msg0002
rows.name:
Meh?! Oh no...
Game of Komeme is up!

rows.label: qst700807_msg0101
rows.name:
Well, it's admirable that you're
working so diligently...

rows.label: qst700807_msg0102
rows.name:
But first things first, you should really
go and apologize to the lady.

rows.label: qst700807_msg0201
rows.name:
Sorry to bug you while you're on
your shift, Komeme...

rows.label: qst700807_msg0202
rows.name:
But you need to give the old lass
an earnest apology. I think that's
equally as important as your job!

rows.label: qst700807_msg0301
rows.name:
Oh, good show. You almost had us
fooled there for a second.

rows.label: qst700807_msg0302
rows.name:
Now, do head along to the old lady,
if you please.

rows.label: qst700807_msg0401
rows.name:
There are some things about Nopon
I'll never understand...

rows.label: qst700807_msg0501
rows.name:
I'm really sorry to bother you, but
I don't think this can wait.

rows.label: qst700807_msg0502
rows.name:
The old lady is expecting an apology.
You understand, don't you?

rows.label: qst700807_msg0601
rows.name:
Wait, so you ran off and started
working?

rows.label: qst700807_msg0602
rows.name:
If you've got the time to do that,
you've got time to go apologize
to the old lady!

rows.label: qst700807_msg0701
rows.name:
Hiding in plain sight, eh? Well, it was
a clever idea, I'll give you that.

rows.label: qst700807_msg0702
rows.name:
But you can't skirt around the issue
any more. Now man up and apologize
to the lady.

rows.label: qst700807_msg0801
rows.name: Were you even trying to hide?

rows.label: qst700807_msg0802
rows.name:
I don't particularly care, either way.
Just as long as you get yourself to
Oulu-san on the double.

rows.label: qst700807_msg0901
rows.name: Your method of hiding was novel.

rows.label: qst700807_msg0902
rows.name:
But the time for hiding is over. You
must meet with the lady now.
